Playbook documentation
==============================

.. ansibleautotask:: Create cluster user account
      :playbook: /root/testing_readthedocs/user_account.yml

.. ansibleautotask:: Create ldap user account
         :playbook: /root/testing_readthedocs/user_account.yml

.. ansibleautotask:: update cluster user account
   :playbook: /root/testing_readthedocs/user_account.yml

.. ansibleautotask:: delete user account
      :playbook: /root/testing_readthedocs/user_account.yml
